name: OptGroup
description: Allows designers to build dropdown boxes with option groups; sections of choices, by annotating a dropdown field with @OPTGROUP='x,y,z', where x, y and z represent choices whose labels become the group labels. Does not work for dropdowns where autocomplete is enabled.

authors.name: Günther Rezniczek
authors.institution: Marien Hospital Herne - Klinikum der Ruhr-Universität Bochum

action-tags.description: Displays selected dropdown choices as option group labels, wherein the synyax @OPTGROUP='x,y,z' means that choices x, y and z are not selectable, but instead their labels are used as the group labels of the other options.
